attributes.action: Get rid of the 3 party whip where the incumbent government bullies mps to tow the government line or loose their elected position they are in
attributes.additional_details: I had never heard of the 3 party whip before this vote and i am totally disgusted that an elected government can bully an elected mp to override what the electorates wishes are.This supposed government are supposed to stand against bullying of any sort but use strong arm tactics to force their will on the populus.
